DOC.brief_summary: It is an observational multi-center study to assess the safety profile of Prevenar13 used among Korean children in the routine clinical setting following a licensure and introduction of the vaccine. This study is designed to fulfill regulatory requirement for any new drug authorized by KFDA.
DOC.criteria: Infants and children aged 6 weeks to 5 years, whose legally authorized representatives of patients agree to provide written informed consent form (data privacy statement). Infants and children who are not indicated and/or contraindicated for the Prevenar13 usage will not be included.
